title: Prediction & Confidence Logic
description: Guiding principles and implementation strategies for prediction accuracy and confidence modeling in the Aureus Engine.

contents.prediction_weighting: Confidence should scale with matching signature length. Partial matches degrade confidence proportionally.
contents.gradient_confidence: Output predictions should include a scalar confidence value rather than a binary true/false result.
contents.signature_decay: Confidence should decay with deviation chain shortening. Implement decay models to reflect probabilistic dropoff.
contents.feedback_loop: Store failed vs. successful predictions for possible model tuning or override alerts.
